attributes.action: Legislate so that only registered architects can submit planning applications
attributes.additional_details:
Architects are trained professionals and we believe are undervalued in the work they do. Qualified architects are leaving the sector at an alarming rate whilst being undercut and undermined by unqualified and inexperienced individuals.
 
Banning planning applications from people who are not registered architects should help ensure higher standards within the built environment, better mitigation of risk and value being brought back to the profession. Stopping the public and other professionals from submitting applications should also ease the strain on council backlog.
attributes.background: Change legislation so that only Architects can submit planning applications. These professionals have 7+ years of education and training, and we believe other professionals and members of the public should not be able submit these applications.
